title:
Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site
: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Painting of Mary McLeod Bethune in front of the Council House NPS, painting by Paul Linquist  The National Park Service offers a number of opportunities for young people all ages to learn more about the Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site.   Be A Junior Ranger Student Packets Chopstick Book Reading Ranger Family Story Time       Join National Park Service Rangers every Monday at 10:30 a.m. at the Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site for a fun and educational story time and craft activity. NPS                    Chopstick Book Participants   4 Photos  Send us your pictures of how much fun you had making the Mary McLeod Bethune Chopstick Book!
